name: Character Oracles
description: When encountering a character, focus on what you learn or perceive as a first impression using tables such as @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.fde52f9b5a457652]{Character First Look} and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.5cff709d01b2cdb5]{Character Disposition}. Then envision or generate additional details over time.
